com.rattat.micro.game.aster
Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rattat.micro.game.aster.SoundManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, ShipListener
public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameListener, ShipListener

An instance of the SoundManager class responds to game and ship events to play sounds at the appropriate times

Author:
william@rattat.com
